languages.text: "Не представляю, Лорд-капитан. Это действительно смущает. Возможно, на корабле шпион... Или регент Ааронто блефует. В любом случае, нам стоит ответить — навигаторы крайне влиятельные и полезные союзники".

traits.locale_text: "Не представляю, Лорд-капитан. Это действительно смущает. Возможнно, на корабле шпион... Или регент Ааронто блефует. В любом случае, нам стоит ответить — Навигаторы крайне влиятельные и полезные союзники".

languages.text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."
languages.original_text: "Не представляю, Лорд-капитан. Это действительно смущает. Возможно, на корабле шпион... Или регент Ааронто блефует. В любом случае, нам стоит ответить — навигаторы крайне влиятельные и полезные союзники".

traits.locale_text: "I have no idea, Lord Captain." It really troubles me. Perhaps we have a spy on board... Or regent Aaronto bluffs. In any case, we should answer — the Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies."

"I have no idea, Lord Captain." It really troubles me. Perhaps we have a spy on board... Or regent Aaronto bluffs. In any case, we should answer — the Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies."

"I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

"I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

"I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

languages.text: “我也想知道是怎么回事，舰长大人，这确实很令人不安。可能是我们的船上有间谍……也可能是阿伦托摄政王在虚张声势，但无论是哪种情况，我认为都应该做出回应。导航者会成为非常强大、非常有用的盟友。”
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

traits.locale_text: “我也想知道是怎么回事，舰长大人，这确实很令人不安。可能是我们的船上有间谍……也可能是阿伦托摄政王在虚张声势，但无论是哪种情况，我认为都应该做出回应。导航者会成为非常强大、非常有用的盟友。”

languages.text: «Ojalá lo supiera, Lord Capitán. Es preocupante, sin duda. Tal vez tengamos un espía a bordo... o quizá el regente Aaronto solo lo haya supuesto. En cualquier caso, creo que deberíamos responder. Los Navegantes son aliados extremadamente poderosos y útiles».
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá lo supiera, Lord Capitán. Es preocupante, sin duda. Tal vez tengamos un espía a bordo... o quizá el regente Aaronto solo lo haya supuesto. En cualquier caso, creo que deberíamos responder. Los Navegantes son aliados extremadamente poderosos y útiles».

languages.text: "Wenn ich das nur wüsste, Lord Captain. Der Vorgang ist in der Tat beunruhigend. Vielleicht haben wir einen Spion an Bord ... oder Regent Aaronto blufft. So oder so ... ich denke, wir sollten ihm antworten. Navigatoren sind schließlich außerordentlich mächtige und nützliche Verbündete."
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich das nur wüsste, Lord Captain. Der Vorgang ist in der Tat beunruhigend. Vielleicht haben wir einen Spion an Bord ... oder Regent Aaronto blufft. So oder so ... ich denke, wir sollten ihm antworten. Navigatoren sind schließlich außerordentlich mächtige und nützliche Verbündete."

languages.text: « J'aimerais le savoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est effectivement préoccupant. Nous avons peut-être un espion à bord... ou le régent Aaronto bluffe. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, je crois qu'il vaut mieux répondre. Les navigateurs sont des alliés extrêmement puissants et utiles. »
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais le savoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est effectivement préoccupant. Nous avons peut-être un espion à bord... ou le régent Aaronto bluffe. Dans un cas comme dans l'ordre, je crois qu'il vaut mieux répondre. Les navigateurs sont des alliés extrêmement puissants et utiles. »

languages.text: 「それが分からないのです、ロード・キャプテン。実に厄介ですね。もしかしたら、船内にスパイが…もしくは摂政アーロントのはったりかもしれません。どちらにせよ、返答すべきでしょう。航宙士はとても力があって、持っておきたい有能な同盟相手です」
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."

traits.locale_text: 「それが分からないのです、ロード・キャプテン。実に厄介ですね。もしかしたら、船内にスパイが…もしくは摂政アーロントのはったりかもしれません。どちらにせよ、返答すべきでしょう。航宙士はとても力があって、持っておきたい有能な同盟相手です」

languages.text: "Bilmeyi çok isterdim Lord Kaptan. Sahiden tedirgin edici bir durum. Gemimizde bir casus olabilir... Ya da Naip Aaronto blöf yapıyor. Öyle veya böyle cevap vermek icap eder. Neticede rotacılar, hayli kudretli ve işlevli müttefiklerdir."
languages.original_text: "I wish I knew, Lord Captain. It is troubling indeed. Perhaps we have a spy on board... or Regent Aaronto is bluffing. In either case, I believe we should respond. Navigators are extremely powerful and useful allies to have."
